meta.label: Sync from Azure Blob Storage [CSV (Metastore compatible) only] to Synapse
meta.description: This recipe replaces the sync recipe between Azure Blob Storage [CSV (Metastore compatible) only] and Synapse

inputRoles.name: input_dataset
inputRoles.label: Input adlsgen2 dataset [CSV (Metastore compatible) only]
inputRoles.description: This connection must be a adlsgen2 (Azure Blob Storage) dataset stored as a CSV (Metastore compatible) only

outputRoles.name: output_dataset
outputRoles.label: synapse dataset
outputRoles.description: This dataset should only be a synapse connection
